My Journey

2023 - Present

Developing production-ready projects at Universidad Autónoma de Tamaulipas, including a point of sale system with Java and MySQL, and a functional web application with Laravel-MySQL-Blade for a medical clinic.

Systems Engineering Student

2023 - Present

Currently pursuing a Systems Engineering degree at Universidad Autónoma de Tamaulipas, focusing on software development and modern architectures while applying theoretical knowledge to real projects.

Academic Projects & Technical Education

2020 - 2023

Participated in project exhibitions at CBTIS No. 103, including a mobile app for public transport route location. Developed static websites with HTML-JS-CSS and mobile apps with Kotlin, earning a Technical Programming degree.
